overview_of_class: Topics for discussion and exploration will include (but not necessarily be limited to):  The history, ecology and sociopolitical impact of cacao cultivation and chocolate production; the biology and psychology of gustation and olfaction (taste and smell); the biochemistry of the components of chocolate, and their physiological and neurological effects; chocolate in fiction/literature.
name: First-Year Seminar
topic: Chocolate: From the Biochemical to the Geopolitica
subject: BIOL_SCI
